document_title: Excess estrogen: Signs, causes and prevention
subsection_content: The body increases the production of estrogen or reduces the production of another hormone such as testosterone or progesterone. This condition leads to an imbalance between sex hormones. (2); Estrogen levels may increase as a result of the medication. Patients using estrogen replacement therapy, a treatment for menopausal symptoms, are more likely to face the side effects of estrogen. Other drugs that also have the potential to increase estrogen levels include hormonal contraceptives, some antibiotics, herbal medicines, phenothiazines.; Have a family history of high estrogen; Some health problems can increase estrogen levels such as obesity, ovarian tumors, liver disease...
subsection_title: thua estrogen.json. The cause is excess estrogen
subsection_data:
thua estrogen.json. The cause is excess estrogen
The body increases the production of estrogen or reduces the production of another hormone such as testosterone or progesterone. This condition leads to an imbalance between sex hormones. (2); Estrogen levels may increase as a result of the medication. Patients using estrogen replacement therapy, a treatment for menopausal symptoms, are more likely to face the side effects of estrogen. Other drugs that also have the potential to increase estrogen levels include hormonal contraceptives, some antibiotics, herbal medicines, phenothiazines.; Have a family history of high estrogen; Some health problems can increase estrogen levels such as obesity, ovarian tumors, liver disease...
